title: HHB, HHP!
content:
For a great man and a good friend. I hope today and the rest of your days are excellent.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/HHBHHP08_3936.gif)

 [‹ semi condensed font recommendation](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46942 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font help ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46882 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
Right on Paul. Have a great day on this the anniversery of your birth day.

Or something like that ; ^ )

I got you this Hello Kitty AR15 assult rifle:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Hello-Kitty-AR-15-Rifle_5198.jpg)

And the Hello Kitty USB keyboard Cleaner:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Hello-Kitty-USB-keyboard-cleaner-1_4902.jpg)

And your very own Hello Kitty Aquarium:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Hello_KittyA_4925.jpg)

Naw, no cake for you! ; ^ )

j a m e s
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hhp_4528.png)
Happy birthday to you (and my daughter)!

I hope you had some enHranted evening! Happy Birthday!

ChrisL
Happy Birthday Hrant!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hrant_5073.png)

Happy Birthday!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hrant_5276.png)

Happy Birthday, Hrant. Hope it’s a good one!

Sharon

Papaver for Mr. Papazian!
Happy birthday, Hrant!
DJ, let’s kick this mutha out! Happy Birthday, Hrant!
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hbdhhp_4778.jpg)

Happy Birthday, dearest Hrant!  
“Khoob Piyo aur Jug-Jug Ziyo!”
Another year older, but not yet old. Happy Birthday, Hrant.

Congratulations, let yourself be seen around more often.

Héctor
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hbhhp_6153.png)

E H B

¡ ENHORABUENA !

Happy Birthday Hrant!

:D
Eben, what typeface is that?

Wow, you remembered! :-)  
My big four-oh feels much warmer, thanks to all you guys.  
And such nice fonts you have!

hhp

Ah, so you saw them all. That’s good!

Satya: It’s my not yet named monospace.

Yes, a truely happy one Hrant!

dr
happy belated birthday Hrant!

Big four-oh? What, you’re only forty?  
That’s young. You’re still young, and  
you know what Oscar Wilde said about  
being young, “Youth, it’s the one thing worth having.”

Actually I did get you a cake but I ate it ;^)  
Aw spit. Happy 40th birthday dude.

j a m e s
Le Mans will have to be next year then Hrant, unless you want to do the classic;-)

Happy loins-bursting-forth-from day

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/hrant_5970.jpg)

Happy belated birthday to you, dear Hrant.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Hrant_5074.jpg)
The best, dear Hrant!

I’m as usual way too late, but nevertheless: happy birthday.

Somehow I always miss these threads. :(

Happy belated birthday, Hrant!

As my father-in-law says, 40+ is the prime of life.

Hrant, trade yourself in for two twenties :)

Happy Birthday, belated!

...

عيد ميلاد سعيد مع باقة من الورد  
Happy Birthday with A bundle of Flowers

Sorry I’m late...  
wishing you the best on your (belated) birthday.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907005907im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/armen_danc_birthday3_5087.jpg)

Happy birthday, Hrant! (Very late, but better late than never.) I haven’t been around much, but it’s great to see all the cool birthday greetings people have left for you.

s’marks
